content: the established stitch pattern according to chart b to the end of the round work as described above until you have finished chart c and chart d row 26 26 32 remove markers chart d chart c chart key karjalan neito socks page 3/5 heel turn foot redistribute sts as follows the first 32 32 35 continue in the established stitch pattern on sts of the round onto the lhn the last 25 25 needle 1 and knit the sts on needle 2 until 34 sts of the round onto the rhn and the foot measures a minimum of 8 8 5 8 5 cm / remaining 29 35 35 sts onto the cable 3⅛ 3⅜ 3⅜ inches less than the desired final length finishing with chart b row 7 work the heel turn back and forth as follows knit one round row 1 rs k6 k6 k3 ssk k1 turn work a lateral vikkel braid on needle 1 only as described on page 2 starting with a m1l row 2 ws sl1 p6 p2tog p1 turn and finishing with step 2 of the lateral braid row 3 rs sl1 knit until 1 st remains before one stitch before the end of needle 1 finally the gap ssk k1 turn k1 and pass the penultimate st on the rhn the last braid st over the last knitted stitch row 4 ws sl1 purl until 1 st remains before starting at the beginning of needle 2 i e the the gap p2tog p1 turn sole knit one round repeat row 3 and 4 until 1 unworked st switch to larger needles if desired remains on each side of the heel turn finishing with row 4 there are now 33 33 39 starting at the beginning of needle 2 k19 and sts in the heel turn and 29 35 35 sts on the pm this is a temporary bor while working cable the stranded colourwork attach cc starting at the temporary bor work the continue working in the round on the rs as stranded colourwork as follows in each follows sl1 knit until 1 st remains before the round work chart e sts 1-7 once and then gap ssk from now on the instep sts the sts work sts 8-13 a total of 9 10 11 times left on hold on the cable while working the please note that st 2 of the chart is not heel turn are referred to as needle 1 the sole worked on row 1-10 and st 4 of the chart is sts are referred to as needle 2 not worked on row 13 on needle 1 i e the instep continue in the after finishing chart e row 13 remove the established stitch pattern according to chart temporary bor marker cut cc and knit to the b please note that the first repeat of the end of needle 2 with mc pattern starts at stitch 2 of the chart switch to smaller needles if desired work
